metrics_conclusion: Bad Liar has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Bad Liar has sections analyzed in the following keys: G♯ Dorian,  and A♭ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
